definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The exact amount that Floey will have to pay, will be decided when the two teams meet next time.
sentences.chinese: “转会费”的准确数目将在两队下次相遇时确定。

sentences.english: That remains the highest transfer fee ever paid for a player.
sentences.chinese: 这笔金额直到现在仍然是支付球员转会费最高的一笔。

sentences.english: The Biancocelesti will pay the Portuguese side 950,000 euros for the transfer.
sentences.chinese: 蓝鹰人将为这名葡萄牙球员提供95万欧元的转会费。

definition: to transfer to another club (professional sports)
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
